abstract.text: Location Indicator layer.
The size of the top image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.
Default value: 1.
The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.
Unique layer name
A spherical dome around the map that is always rendered behind all other layers.
Warning: As of v10.6.0,
is the preferred method for atmospheric styling. Sky layer is not supported by the globe projection, and will be phased out in future major release.
Name of image in sprite to use as the background of the location indicator.

The amount of the perspective compensation, between 0 and 1. A value of 1 produces a location indicator of constant width across the screen. A value of 0 makes it scale naturally according to the viewing projection.
Default value: “0.85”.
Layer types that will also be removed if fallen below this clip layer.
The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.
Interface that provides access to elevation data.
Client-side hillshading visualization based on DEM data. Currently, the implementation only supports Mapbox Terrain RGB and Mapzen Terrarium tiles.
The size of the top image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.
Default value: 1.
Name of image in sprite to use as the middle of the location indicator.
Raster map textures such as satellite imagery.
The size of the bearing image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.
Default value: 1.
The size of the shadow image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.
Default value: 1.
Layer that removes 3D content from map.
A filled circle.
The color for drawing the accuracy radius border. To adjust transparency, set the alpha component of the color accordingly.
Default value: “#ffffff”.
A heatmap.
An array of [latitude, longitude, altitude] position of the location indicator.
Default value: [0,0,0].
Name of image in sprite to use as the top of the location indicator.

If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Default value: 1.

Default value: 0.

Default value: 1.
The opacity of the entire location indicator layer.
Default value: 1. Value range: [0, 1]
